None.Name: Frozen Warth
None.Description: Enable to become immobile and gain: Whirlwind

None.Name: Whirlwind
None.Description: Twice per second unit unleashes a hail of icy shards that deal 34 damage to enemies in a 5m radius its target, up to 52 in total. Does extra damage against frozen targets.
